title:
An Algorithmic Approach to Inner Derivations of Low-Dimensional Zinbiel
  Algebras
abstract:
In this paper, we introduce the concept of inner derivations of
low-dimensional Zinbiel algebras and investigate their properties. The primary
objective of this study is to develop an algorithm to characterize the inner
derivations of any n-dimensional Zinbiel algebra in matrix form. Additionally,
we apply this algorithm to two, three and four-dimensional complex Zinbiel
algebras, providing explicit descriptions of their inner derivations.
